p: Although NHP carcasses were found naturally infected by ZIKV in Minas Gerais between 2016 and 2017 [ 33], no copies of ZIKV viral RNA were detected in any mosquito collected in the present study and, therefore, further studies are needed to identify if there is a Zika sylvatic cycle occurring. However, since it was not the main objective, no NHP survey in the PESRM in the EEF was performed in this study.
